tier.item: (1) dhen aghorasa akoma ti tha foreso sto parti
not bought-I yet what will wear-I at the party
"I haven't bought yet what I am going to wear at the party."

(1) Floating Quantifier (FQ) Construction: host noun-CASE ... ClP/MP
a. MP: Mizu-ga kinoo 3-littoru koboreta b. ClP: Hako-ga kinoo 3-ko otita
water-NOM yesterday 3-liter spilled box-NOM yesterday 3-CL fell
`3 liters of water spilled yesterday' `3 boxes fell yesterday'
